section.name: Acknowledgments
section.p:
Acknowledgments go to the following people:
Ken Birman (Cornell) who provided funding for my 2 years as post-doc at Cornell, and for valuable discussions
Robbert VanRenesse with whom I had many insightful discussions about the design of Horus and Ensemble, and Virtual Synchrony in general
My wife Jeannette who excused her husband for spending hours in front of a computer on weekends
